text: Chiarini is an Italian surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Daniele Chiarini (born 1979), Italian footballer *Gianfranco Chiarini (born 1966), Italian chef and television personality *Marcantonio Chiarini (c. 1652 – 1730), Italian painter *Mario Chiarini (born 1981), Italian baseball player *Pietro Chiarini (c. 1717 – 1765), Italian composer *Riccardo Chiarini (born 1984), Italian cyclist ==See also== *10376 Chiarini, main-belt asteroid Category:Italian-language surnames
title: Chiarini
